Proficiencies.Armor: Light armor, medium armor, heavy armor, shields
Proficiencies.Skills: Choose two from Acrobatics, Animal Handling, Athletics, History, Insight, Intimidation, Perception, and Survival

Brigand’s Set.Contents: 2 dueling daggers, garrotte, rapier, 5 throwing daggers, leather brigandine, burglar’s pack, vial of basic poison

Guard’s Set.Contents: Longbow and 20 arrows, pike, shortsword, medium shield, padded leather, backpack, bell, lantern (standard), manacles, signal whistle

Scout’s Set.Contents: Greatsword, 4 javelins, hide, medium shield, climbing gear, explorer’s pack

Squire’s Set.Contents: Greatsword, 4 javelins, hide, medium shield, climbing gear, explorer’s pack

Choices.ARCHERY: You gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls you make with ranged weapons.
Choices.BATTLE READY: You may activate up to 2 combat stances you know without expending any exertion points using the same bonus action. Once you activate a set of combat stances in this way you can’t use this feature again until you finish a short or long rest .
